lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Before it would approve the Midwest Exchange request for the unlisted trading privileges, the SEC had insisted that it and the National Association of Securities Dealers, NASD, come up with a way of reporting and combining information on stock prices and transactions.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The SEC's unanimous decision granting so-called unlisted trading privileges to the 25 NASDAQ securities will allow the Midwest Exchange to begin trading the issues by May 18 under a one-year pilot program.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The 25 securities had an average dollar volume last year of 2.4 billion dlrs and made up 18 pct of the dollar volume of all the securities quoted on the NASD's National Market System.
